But that doesn't mean you shouldn't know everything you can about the latest from the world's second-largest smartphone maker. Join MrMobile for the Huawei Mate 10 Pro review!   [SUBSCRIBE]     [ABOUT MRMOBILE'S HUAWEI MATE 10 PRO REVIEW ]  MrMobile's Huawei Mate 10 Pro Review was produced following 60 days with a Huawei Mate 10 Pro review device provided by Huawei. The device as reviewed was model BLA-L29 running build 127(C432) at press time. It was variously paired to an LG Watch Sport and Movado Connect.  Disclosure: Huawei offered MrMobile and several other members of the media a helicopter tour from Las Vegas to the Grand Canyon during CES 2018, for the purpose of shooting photos and video with the Mate 10 Pro review device.
